body_html:
That is too old. You should upgrade to the latest version of pytorch (which is 0.4). Installation instructions can be found at our main website. Hope that helps!

If you don't want to upgrade you can probably copy and paste the BCELossWithLogits code and make your own Loss function.

body:
That is too old. You should upgrade to the latest version of pytorch (which is 0.4). Installation instructions can be found at our [main website](https://pytorch.org/). Hope that helps!

If you don't want to upgrade you can probably copy and paste the BCELossWithLogits code and make your own Loss function.
